column5: I have a couple quantum reels that are in need of repair. Any suggestions as to where to go in the GTA/Hamilton area?
Rockys tackle repair, in orillia. They are awesome to deal with. Look them up online, I don't have the number on me.
Aikmans services Quantums as well.  Hwy10/Hwy5 in Mississausage.

There is a guy in Grimsby that does reel repair though I've never had to use him, until now. I have a baitcaster with a faulty drag. I was told I can drop my reel off at Grimsby Tackle on hwy 8.  Dave
Using the schematics for my Quantums I've ordered the needed parts from "Aikmans," not hard to clean, repair and lube yourself.
Thanks for the replies guys, I will check out Aikmans on my way home.
